subject: Re: Compliments Page for Website
preview: Many thanks!  Have a lovely week-end.

full_threads.body:
Many thanks!

Have a lovely week-end.
+15 mins added to harvest and closed.

Hi Jules, 

Confirming the compliments form has been added to the following page: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/tenancy/applications-resources/

@chris All good on this one.
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/tenancy/applications-resources/

+15mins Thanks!

@joel, can you please assist in adding form "Compliments Form" https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/submit-a-compliment/

to page: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/tenancy/applications-resources/

In section Forms.
Ok that's fine. As long as the compliments form is in the same form section

Hi Jules, 

Confirming the compliments link has been added to the footer under complaints. 

Regarding the transitional plus form and the transitional nomination form, they are displayed alphabetically left to right, top to bottom. To change the position would mean the other forms within that section would lose their order.

It should sit with the complaints form, under the complaints form.

The the transitional plus form can sit under transitional nomination form

Hi Jules, 

Most welcome.

Please let us know where you would like it positioned in the main navigation. 

I can see it could be featured on page: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/tenancy/applications-resources/ (screenshot) as well as in the website footer (screenshot).

Thanks Chris,

Please make the compliment page live, add to main navigation. It is good to go.

Hi Jules, 

All taken care of, thanks! One of our dev team needed access to update the forms. 

Confirming there are indeed 2 separate pages for compliments and complaints:
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/lodge-a-complaint/
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/submit-a-compliment/

The compliment page is yet to be added to the main navigation, please let us know where you would like it to feature.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body: @chris all good now please check.

HI,

I made a few text edits. Do I just log out for you to have control?

Hi @manuel,
There are to 2 pages:
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/lodge-a-complaint/ (existing page to be copied) and 
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/submit-a-compliment (now in draft: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=2664&preview=true) 

Please copy/create a new gravity form to use on the /submit-a-compliment page and embed it. 
customer instructions below:
--//--
It should be identical to the Complaints page in layout and wording but replace all uses of the word "Complaint" with "Compliment".
The section "Who is completing the complaint" can be removed as well.
Remove "For more information, please refer to the Complaints and Appeals Policy"
--//--

Hi Jules,

We are trying to perform updates on the Gravity forms and it shows as currently being edited by you. Can we please have control of the edit function
Can I just check that the compliments page is a new page. It does not replace the complaints page. It is new, separate page.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body: Thanks. I'm in and will review with the CEO.

Hi Jules, 

Chris jumping in on behalf of Rika. 

You will need to log in to the WordPress dashboard to view the page as it is set to a 'draft' status. This ensures only authorised users can view the page before going live. 

Please let me know if you need a hand.

Thank you. The link is not working. Can you please resend.

Cheers
Logged 1.5H to Harvest

Hi Julienne, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now created a Draft page for Cimpliment Form and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the preview link:  https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=1280&preview=true

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
